languages.text: "Но вновь она ускользнула от меня. Да и не было бы славы в такой смерти — я даже не уразумел, с чем бился, и братья мои остались неотысканными".
"But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."
languages.original_text: "Но вновь она ускользнула от меня. Да и не было бы славы в такой смерти — я даже не уразумел, с чем бился, и братья мои остались неотысканными".

traits.locale_text: "But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

traits.locale_text: "But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

traits.locale_text: "But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

traits.locale_text: "But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: “但我却又一次逃过了死亡的魔爪。而且，就算我当时真的死了，那样的死法也毫无荣耀可言。我没有找到我的兄弟们，甚至没弄清楚我的敌人究竟是什么。”
languages.original_text: "But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."

traits.locale_text: “但我却又一次逃过了死亡的魔爪。而且，就算我当时真的死了，那样的死法也毫无荣耀可言。我没有找到我的兄弟们，甚至没弄清楚我的敌人究竟是什么。”
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: 「だが、またも俺は死を免れた。あんな死に方をしても栄誉にはならなかっただろう…俺は何と戦ったかも言えなけりゃ、同胞も見つけられてない」
languages.original_text: "But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、またも俺は死を免れた。あんな死に方をしても栄誉にはならなかっただろう…俺は何と戦ったかも言えなけりゃ、同胞も見つけられてない」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «Pero ha vuelto a eludirme. Y esa muerte habría carecido completamente de gloria. No sabía contra qué luchaba y no había encontrado a mis hermanos».
languages.original_text: "But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."

traits.locale_text: «Pero ha vuelto a eludirme. Y esa muerte habría carecido completamente de gloria. No sabía contra qué luchaba y no había encontrado a mis hermanos».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Mais la mort m'a encore échappé, et il n'y aurait eu nulle gloire à tirer d'une telle fin. Je n'aurais pas su dire contre quoi je me battais et je n'avais pas retrouvé mes frères. »
languages.original_text: "But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."

traits.locale_text: « Mais la mort m'a encore échappé, et il n'y aurait eu nulle gloire à tirer d'une telle fin. Je n'aurais pas su dire contre quoi je me battais et je n'avais pas retrouvé mes frères. »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Aber ich bin dem Tod wieder entronnen. Und er wäre nicht ehrenvoll gewesen – ich wusste nicht einmal, wogegen ich kämpfe, und ich hatte meine Brüder nicht gefunden."
languages.original_text: "But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich bin dem Tod wieder entronnen. Und er wäre nicht ehrenvoll gewesen – ich wusste nicht einmal, wogegen ich kämpfe, und ich hatte meine Brüder nicht gefunden."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Ölüm beni bir kez daha kandırdı. Zaten böyle bir ölümün şanı olmazdı. Neye karşı savaştığımı bile anlayamadım, kardeşlerimi de bulamadım."
languages.original_text: "But it eluded me once again. And there would have been no glory in such a death — I could not even tell what I was fighting against, and I had not found my brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Beni bir kez daha kandırdı. Böyle bir ölümün şanı olmazdı. Neye karşı savaştığımı bile anlayamadım, kardeşlerimi de bulamadım."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
